article.headline: Robert Morris 56, St. Francis, Pa. 51
article.story: LORETTO, Pa. (AP) -- A.J. Jackson scored 14 points, and Robert Morris rallied in the final seven minutes to hand St. Francis, Pa., its ninth straight loss, 65-55 Saturday night. Robert Morris (13-6, 4-2 Northeast Conference) led 27-19 at the half. St. Francis (3-15, 1-6) rallied in the second half and took a 43-37 lead with 11 minutes left. The Red Flash led 48-45 with 6:44 remaining before the Colonials took control. Jimmy Langhurst tied it with a 3-pointer, and Bateko Francisco hit another on the ensuing possession to put Robert Morris ahead to stay. A basket by Gary Wallace closed an 8-0 run, and the Colonials went on a 14-3 spurt to take a 59-51 lead. Langhurst scored 12 points for Robert Morris, which built an early lead in the first with the help of a 13-0 run. Devin Sweetney scored 12 points, and Bassirou Dieng had 11 in a reserve role for St. Francis.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
